alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 05 at 11:41AM PST until December 06 at 5:18AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oregon... Siletz River at Siletz affecting Lincoln County. Nehalem River near Foss affecting Tillamook and Clatsop Counties. Trask River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. For the Nw Oregon / Sw Washington Coast...including Willapa, Naselle, Vernonia, Covered Bridge near Rosburg, Foss, Tillamook, Tillamook, Beaver, Siletz, Tidewater, Mapleton...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Siletz River at Siletz. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...Above 16.0 feet, expect minor lowland flooding and minor flooding of some structures and roads along the Siletz River. Flooding may be exacerbated during high tide. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM PST Tuesday the stage was 14.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this afternoon to 17.5 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage around midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 745 PM PST.
